titleStmt.title: A new ditty: of a lover, tost hither and th[i]ther, that cannot speake his mind when they are together. To the tune of, Hide Park.
titleStmt.author: Lowberry, Peter.

publicationStmt.publisher: For Edward Wright dwelling neere Christs Church gate,

notesStmt.note: In two parts, separated for mounting; woodcuts at head of each part.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
